name: Core.MakeModelMenu

aliases.name: Flags
aliases.comment: Flags which are used to retrieve and display the Make & Model data
aliases.type: { id : String , apiEndpointUrl : String , apiFilterField : String , baseLinkUrl : String , redirectUrl : String }

aliases.name: Model
aliases.comment:
A representation of the MakeModelMenu

modal - The modal component that the MakeModelMenu will use
apiEndpointUrl - The url of the API endpoint to retrieve the Make/Model data from
apiFilterField - The filter field used in the API request
baseLinkUrl - The path to re-direct to once the Make Model has been selected
redirectUrl - The url that the Menu should re-direct to once the Make & Model has been selected, e.g <https://quotes.carwow.co.uk/>
aliases.type: { state : Core.MakeModelMenu.State , modal : CarwowTheme.Modal.Model , apiEndpointUrl : Erl.Url , apiFilterField : String , baseLinkUrl : Erl.Url , redirectUrl : String , preselectedMakeSlug : Maybe.Maybe String , location : Erl.Url }

types.name: Msg
types.comment:
The different messages the Make Model Menu accepts

ModalBackClicked - The back button is clicked by the user
MakesResponse - A response is received from the Makes endpoint
ModelsResponse -A response is received from the Models endpoint
ModalMsg - A message is received by the underlying Modal component
UrlChange - A message is received when the address bar changes

values.name: update
values.comment: Update the component if a message is received

values.name: view
values.comment: A view representing the whole model

name: Core.NotificationDrawer

aliases.name: Flags
aliases.comment: A flag to represent the API endpoint to retreive notifications

aliases.name: Model
aliases.type: { flags : Core.NotificationDrawer.Flags , notifications : Core.NotificationDrawer.PaginatedResponse , currentPage : Int , drawer : CarwowTheme.Drawer.Model , loadMoreDisabled : Bool }

types.name: Msg
types.comment:
The different messages the Notification Drawer accepts

NewNotification — A new notification has occured
NotificationsResponse — A response has been received from the external notifications API
DrawerMsg — An action has occured on the drawer element
LoadMoreNotifications — The user has requested more notifications

values.name: isDrawerOpen
values.comment:
The current state of the drawer.

Returns true if the drawer is opened, false if it isn't

values.name: update
values.comment: Update the model based on the message received

values.name: view
values.comment: The view for the notification drawer component

name: Core.NotificationMenu
Core.Data.Make

aliases.name: Make
aliases.type: { name : String , slug : String , leaseDealsAvailable : Bool , stockAvailable : Bool , factoryOrderAvailable : Bool }

name: Core.Data.Model

aliases.name: Model
aliases.type: { name : String , slug : String , leaseDealsAvailable : Bool , stockAvailable : Bool , factoryOrderAvailable : Bool }
